If you cast your mind back to December, the good folks at LOVE treated us with a sexy daily advent series , which featured a new beauty flexinâ€™ every single day. To be honest, since it came to a halt, our lives have never really been the same, which is why weâ€™re delighted to see Bella Hadid returning to the magazine for yet another breathtaking shoot.
Here, the raven-haired beauty can be seen posing in some gauzy lingerie andâ€¦well, not too much else. Posing on a gold chaise lounge, itâ€™s a wonder the photographerâ€™s lens didnâ€™t literally melt, such is the smolder. Find further uncensored photos below.
